text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/questionnaire-disabled-display defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
hidden Hidden The item (and its children) should not be visible to the user at all.
protected Protected The item (and possibly its children) should not be selectable or editable but should still be visible - to allow the user to see what questions *could* have been completed had other answers caused the item to be enabled.

concept.definition: The item (and its children) should not be visible to the user at all.

The item (and possibly its children) should not be selectable or editable but should still be visible - to allow the user to see what questions *could* have been completed had other answers caused the item to be enabled.
